The file run_analysis.R contains the code to clean sets of data related to an experiment.

1. First download and unzip the relevant files into directories.
2. Then transforms the datasets and put together the train and test data frames.
3. Filter out those variables that are not means or standard deviations of the original experiment variables.
4. Finally the dataframe is given a proper name to identify the variables
5. Summarise the data as requested
6. Files are stored for further analysis.
